CustomField.description: Shows color codes for test case runs that pass or fail.
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Result__c), "Pass", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 10, 10) & " Pass", "Fail", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 10, 10) & " Fail", "Not yet run", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 10, 10) & " Not run", "Blocked", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001G6XM", "blue", 10, 10) & " Blocked", "Expected fail", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000002fK9x", "orange", 10, 10) & " Expected fail", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 10, 10) & " Not run")
CustomField.label: Test Result
